TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITestCaseSource

Docs.summary: ITestCaseSource interface is implemented by Types that know how to return a set of ITestCaseData items for use by a test method.
Docs.remarks: This method is defined differently depending on the version of .NET.

Docs.summary: Returns a set of ITestCaseDataItems for use as arguments to a parameterized test method.
